title: segtools-signal-distribution reporting statistics for wrong labels

content.raw:
Original [issue 25](https://code.google.com/p/segtools/issues/detail?id=25) created by ericr86 on 2012-01-19T11:43:54.000Z:

In segtools version 1.1.9, the segment labels are being shuffled in segtools-signal distribution, both in the tab file and the resulting plots. This occurs with or without the use of a mnemonics file.

It appears that the labels are assigned based on which appear first in the segmentation file, i.e. the first segment label in the segmentation is relabelled either 0 (if no mnemonics) or to the label 0 is mapped to in the mnemonic file.

The issue appears to arise in signal_distribution.py, line 69, labels = segmentation.labels.
